synopsis.text: Sally, the adventurous and slightly mischievous witch princess of the magical realm, finds herself drawn to the human world after a chance encounter with two schoolgirls, Yoshiko Hanamura and Sumire Kasugano. After using her magical abilities to protect her new friends from burglars, Sally decides to stay on Earth and experience life as a human. Taking on the surname Yumeno, she attends school with Yoshiko and Sumire and embarks on a series of exciting adventures. With the help of her loyal companion, Kabu, Sally must navigate the challenges of keeping her magical identity a secret while also learning valuable lessons about friendship and the importance of experiences beyond the magical arts. Will Sally be able to keep her secret safe and continue to enjoy her new life in the human world? Join her on this thrilling journey and find out!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
